name: Apollo 11
description: First manned mission to land on the Moon.
key_milestone: Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin landed on the Moon's surface on July 20, 1969.

name: Vostok 1
description: First human spaceflight, orbited the Earth once.
key_milestone: Yuri Gagarin became the first human to travel into space.

name: Mars Orbiter Mission (Mangalyaan)
description: India's first interplanetary mission to Mars.
key_milestone: Entered Mars orbit on September 24, 2014.

name: Chang'e 4
description: First spacecraft to land on the far side of the Moon.
key_milestone: Landed on the far side of the Moon on January 3, 2019.

name: International Space Station (ISS)
description: Habitable artificial satellite in low Earth orbit.
spacecraft: Multiple modules from various space agencies
key_milestone: First module launched on November 20, 1998.

name: Tiān​wén-1
description: Chinese mission to explore Mars.
key_milestone: Entered Mars orbit on February 10, 2021.

name: Cassini-Huygens
description: Orbited and studied Saturn and its moons.
key_milestone: Huygens probe landed on Titan on January 14, 2005.
recent_update: Mission concluded with controlled descent into Saturn.

name: Hayabusa2
description: Japanese mission to study asteroid Ryugu.
key_milestone: Sample collection from Ryugu on February 21, 2019.
recent_update: Sample capsule on course for Earth.

name: New Horizons
description: First mission to explore Pluto and the Kuiper Belt.
key_milestone: Closest approach to Pluto on July 14, 2015.
recent_update: Continued exploration in the Kuiper Belt.

name: XMM-Newton
description: European Space Agency's X-ray observatory.
key_milestone: Launched on December 10, 1999.

name: Pioneer 10
description: First spacecraft to travel through the asteroid belt, first to make direct observations and obtain close-up images of Jupiter.
key_milestone: Closest approach to Jupiter on December 3, 1973.

name: Parker Solar Probe
description: NASA's mission to study the Sun's corona.
key_milestone: Closest approach to the Sun on January 29, 2024.

name: Hubble Space Telescope
description: Space telescope that has revolutionized astronomy.
key_milestone: Launched on April 24, 1990.

name: Tiangong space station
description: China's modular space station.
key_milestone: Launch of the first module on April 29, 2021.

name: Rosetta
description: ESA's mission to rendezvous with, orbit, and study comet 67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko.
key_milestone: Philae lander touchdown on comet on November 12, 2014.
recent_update: Mission concluded with controlled descent onto comet.

name: Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter (LRO)
description: NASA's mission to map the Moon's surface.
key_milestone: Entered lunar orbit on June 23, 2009.
recent_update: High-resolution mapping of lunar surface ongoing.

name: BepiColombo
description: ESA and JAXA joint mission to Mercury.
key_milestone: Launch on October 20, 2018.
recent_update: In transit to Mercury, data collection ongoing.

name: Tiangong-2
description: China's space laboratory module.
key_milestone: Launched on September 15, 2016.

name: Mars 2020 Perseverance Rover
description: NASA's rover to explore Mars' Jezero Crater.
key_milestone: Landing on Mars' Jezero Crater on February 18, 2021.
recent_update: Rover conducting scientific experiments on Mars.

name: InSight Mars lander
description: NASA's mission to study the interior of Mars.
key_milestone: Landing on Mars on November 26, 2018.
recent_update: Instruments collecting data on Mars' interior.

name: OSIRIS-REx
description: NASA's mission to study asteroid Bennu and return a sample to Earth.
key_milestone: Sample collection from asteroid Bennu on October 20, 2020.
recent_update: Sample return capsule expected to land soon.

name: ISS Commercial Resupply Missions
description: Series of cargo missions to the International Space Station.
spacecraft: Various spacecraft (e.g., SpaceX Dragon, Northrop Grumman Cygnus)
key_milestone: First SpaceX Dragon mission to ISS on May 25, 2012.
recent_update: Regular resupply missions to the ISS ongoing.

name: Herschel Space Observatory
description: ESA's space observatory to study the universe in the far infrared.
key_milestone: Launched on May 14, 2009.

name: Juno
description: NASA's mission to study Jupiter's atmosphere.
key_milestone: Entered Jupiter orbit on July 5, 2016.

name: Solar and Heliospheric Observatory (SOHO)
description: ESA and NASA joint mission to study the Sun.
key_milestone: Launched on December 2, 1995.

name: Chandrayaan-2
description: Indian mission to explore the Moon's south pole.
spacecraft: Chandrayaan-2 orbiter, Vikram lander, Pragyan rover
key_milestone: Entered lunar orbit on August 20, 2019.

name: James Webb Space Telescope (JWST)
description: NASA's upcoming space telescope to observe the universe in infrared wavelengths.
key_milestone: Planned launch on December 18, 2021.

name: Kuiper Belt Object Exploration Mission (New Horizons Extended Mission)
description: NASA's extended mission to explore a Kuiper Belt object.
current_location: Planned trajectory towards a Kuiper Belt object
key_milestone: Planned launch in September 2025.
recent_update: Mission planning and design phase ongoing.

name: Artemis program
description: NASA's program to return humans to the Moon.
spacecraft: Orion spacecraft, Gateway space station, HLS landers
key_milestone: Planned human landing on the Moon in 2025.

name: Dragonfly
description: NASA's mission to explore Saturn's moon Titan with a rotorcraft.
key_milestone: Planned arrival and landing on Titan in 2034.
